Line3.71176: I don't think the books are even that interesting! It's a bunch of nonsense about summoning and greater evils. Now a book about the Snake Gods of Hawezar, THAT would be interesting.
Line1.71176: More trouble today. The Abbot caught me trying to get into the inner cloister. I just wanted to clean! He started yelling at me! Asked what I was doing with the forbidden texts and if I had any idea the knowledge I was messing with.
